name: Space Cassiera
description:
It’s the year 3217f, there isn’t a single planet left unexplored, the galaxy is peaceful, people travel and trade without a worry but there is a place where the universes collide. Tucked away on a small asteroid, somewhere in the Milky Way, the Space Market sells everything you need.

You, of course, are the new cashier. Survive one hell of a week and demonstrate your insane scanning skills.

DEVELOPED BY:

TASSO ROTTO (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2018/2019)

Game Design
Paolo Padello
Tommaso Verde
Alberto Cotevin

Programming
